title: Tracking the cellular uptake and phototoxicity of Ru(II)-polypyridyl-1,8-naphthalimide Tröger's base conjugates
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, 5,344-359
DOI: 10.1039/D3CB00206C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Sandra A. Bright, MariaLuisa Erby, Fergus E. Poynton, Daniel Monteyne, David Pérez-Morga, Thorfinnur Gunnlaugsson, D. Clive Williams, Robert B. P. Elmes
Ru(II)-Polypyridyl-1,8-naphthalimide Tröger's bases have undergone detailed biological profiling to unravel their mechanism of cellular uptake, cellular trafficking and cellular responses to photoexcitation.
